name: Applaydu & Friends games
description:
There is magical news for all Applaydu & Friends teens! So get your spells & potions ready, and prepare to join a magical adventure! With 12 fresh iconic Funko Pop! characters, your teens can embody their favorite magical characters and race through the 2 updated maps of the season. Discover a magical experience of casting spells and using magic potions, dodging fantastic obstacles, and dashing to the top, and join the legacy of being the best in the race! The magical challenge starts now!

Applaydu & Friends by Kinder is a safe playground dedicated to kids ages 8+. Teens will be able to unlock various licensed Funko Pop! characters and extend the Kinder Joy playing experience into the digital world by bringing their favorite heroes to life with obstacle runs.

****Immersive Races and Stumbling Fun*****
Applaydu & Friends is a Kinder game that allows kids to run fun obstacle races. Your kids run, dash, fall, race and get ranked on the result boards. Let them explore and run different races with many obstacles, spells, potions, boost gates and trap boxes.

****Craft Creative Racing Magic*****
This season, teens can discover a collection of the best maps from the Funko Pop! Universes. And for the first time ever, teens can now edit their own maps to play! More curious teens can also discover their coding skills via the coding feature to explore both their logical and creative minds!

****Discover the Power of Funko & Creative Uniqueness*****
Kids will enjoy extra customization features with a magical touch to customize their own experience. Also, teenagers can create their own fantastic avatar: 17 different 3D avatars with various styles are ready to get mixed and matched. Kids can also change their avatars’ hair, eyes and outfits to create their very own style.

****A Safe Gaming Experience For Tweens and Teens*****
Applaydu & Friends from Kinder is certified by the kidSafe Seal Program: It’s a safe platform that is 100% kids-friendly and a creative universe without in-app purchases or ads. It’s dedicated to kids and a platform that protects kids’ identities with anonymous profiles and predefined names. They play in a safe private environment, as it is not connected to any social platform. Even in public mode, the safe community grants privacy.

Applaydu & Friends by Kinder is a lifestyle obstacle running game designed for kids aged 8+. It is playable offline, with no ads, has no in-app purchases, and supports 13 languages.
Applaydu & Friends, an Official Kinder App, is certified by the kidSafe Seal Program (www.kidSafeseal.com).

Contact us at applayduFriends@kinder.com. For privacy-related questions, please write to privacy@ferrero.com or go to http://applayduFriends.kinder.com/legal
To remove your account, please go to https://applaydufriends.kinder.com/legal#remove-account
